name: Super Bit Stick Knight
description:
An endless running game with a retro RPG feel!

How to play:
- Super Bit Stick Knight is an endless runner of sorts
- Tap on the screen and hold to extend your stick
- Let go when you believe it is the right length to reach the next platform
- Land on the treasure chest to accumulate gold coins
- Try to reach a new high score!

Features:
- Easy, one finger gameplay
- Music, sound effects? Sure, why not!
- Addictive gameplay, sometimes your work break isn't enough time
- 50 different character skins to unlock

Hope you enjoy this quick, play as you go, running game!
